text: Pavam I. A. Ivachan is a 1994 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Roy P. Thomas, starring Innocent and Srividya in the lead roles. http://www.nthwall.com/ml/movie/Pavam-Ia-Ivachan-1994/9465401196 ==Cast== * Innocent as I. A. Ivachan * Jagadish as Harichandran * Siddique as Adv. Suseelan Nair * Jagathy Sreekumar as Paramu Ettan * Srividya as Rossy Ivachan * Ganesh Kumar as Lonappan * Suma Jayaram as Sugandhi *Paravoor Bharathan as Yamakanda Kurup * TP Madhavan as Koyikkal Balan Thampy * Kavya Madhavan as Sarah Ivachan * Keerthi Gopinath as Jasmine * Sukumari as I.A Ivachan's mother * Venu Nagavally as Rajan Thampy * Poojappura Ravi as police head constable * Shivaji *Keerthi Gopinath ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Pavam I. A. Ivachan
